mission.posting: An old friend has asked me to remove her Bachelor's Degree from the record. She wants to start a new degree with a clean slate.

email.subject: Clean Slate
email.body:
I have an old friend who regrets doing a Bachelor's Degree in a certain subject. Her name is Laura Nakamura, and she did a degree in Geology. Looking back, she thinks it probably wasn't the best choice for her future. Can't really blame her, though. Geology. Not a real science. The record is up on the Universal Academic Database, but in order to get into it, you'll need a username and password. I recommend taking a look at her professor. Find her Geology Professor, track down his account details for the Academic Database and remove her degree in Geology.
Godspeed, -Z3r0
